description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

5 Grange Grove, Canonbury, Islington, London, N1 2NP

TPO Reference:
T22 – Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.297) 2006
T28 – Eucalyptus of LBI TPO (No.294) 2006

PO Number:
T080463

Work specifications:
1 x Sycamore (T22) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.297) 2006
Reduce crown to the previous points of reduction (Approx. 20%)

1 x Eucalyptus (T28) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.294) 2006
Fell to ground level and remove stump
decision_conditions: The authority  expects to see a replacement tree planted in the rear garden of 5 Grange Grove, N1 2NP. The tree should be of standard size and the species agreed in advance with the tree officer or of the following reccomended species; Liquidamber ( Liquidamber styraciflua), Holly (Ilex aquifolium) and Hornbeam (Carpinus betulus). The replacemnet tree should be planted within 2 planting seasons of the revoval.
